name: Ibis Frankfurt Airport

reviews.title: Good value
reviews.text: We stayed at this hotel because I wanted to be close to the Frankfurt airport for our last night.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had a double room for 79 euros, which is quite cheap for an airport hotel..The room is a typical Ibis room, clean and functional. The buffet breakfast was $10 per person extra which was pretty steep, however it was a good buffet.
reviews.title: Cheap place near the airport

likes.liked: — Free shuttle to and from the airport, cheap rates

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: There is a free shuttle to and from the airport . The trip takes about 25 to 30 minutes. During the afternoon when we arrived by train, the bus only runs every hour which could be quite a wait. During the morning and eveing they run every half hour. I do not know if there are any hotels closer to the airport but I would look.
reviews.title: Dependable Airport Lodging

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Note about the Frankfurt airport. Arrive at least three and one-half hours before an international flight. The lines were long and two hours was just barely enough time. Because it was a Frankfurt-New York flight, we had to go through security twice- the second iincluded a pat-down search!
reviews.title: Good airport hotel

description: The Ibis Frankfurt Airport hotel is located in Kelsterbach, 13 km from Frankfurt. A free shuttle service for the airport (4 km away) runs between 5 a.m. and 11 p.m. The hotel offers 132 airconditioned rooms with WiFi Internet access, including 4 rooms adapted for guests with limited mobility, and also features the La Table restaurant, a bar and a 24 hour snack service. There is an indoor swimming pool and tennis courts 3 km from the hotel. Pets are allowed.
